## Covariance

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
fn <- "../data/data-13-correlation.csv"
simple_data <- read_csv(file=fn)
names(simple_data) <- c("y", "x")
simple_data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method="lm") +
    expand_limits(x=0, y=0)
```
